elements.name: Verification of display of the menu

steps.name: user scans QR code on the table
user should be able to choose "View the Menu" option
user clicks on the "View the Menu" option
user should be displayed "Diner's QA" menu
menu should be displayed as pdf file to the user

name: As a customer, when I scan the QR code, I should be able to choose to see restaurant’s menu

steps.name: user scans QR code on the table
user should be able to see "Pay my Bill" option
user clicks on the "Pay the Bill" option
user should be able to see information of his table
user should be able to see his bill information
